about_the_game:
Reditus is a 2.5 JRPG that seamlessly blends retro sprites in a 3D world. Reditus is a video game set in a world where the god Corydon Deus has disappeared and magic along with him. Augustus, is a devout follower of Corydon Deus who believes that magic must be revived. He embarks on a perilous journey into the Heremus, a desolate wasteland, to find the ruins of Vehere and restore magic. Augustus is joined by his son, Caeser, who is skeptical of his father's faith but desires a better world for himself and his betrothed, Theresa. The Reditus, technologically advanced humans who have banished the magic users to the Heremus, pose a constant threat. The game follows Augustus and Caeser as they navigate the dangers of the Heremus, interact with fellow Rediits, and seek to fulfill their destinies.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850

short_description: Reditus is a 2.5D JRPG, whose story is masterfully crafted leading you through a tragically beautiful world. You will laugh, you will cry, you will become the Reditus.
